subject: AI & Agents
title: The Black Box Problem
description: Learn The Black Box Problem in one minute.

hook.text: A model rejects your loan application. You ask why. It can't explain.

buildup.text: Complex neural networks have millions of parameters. No one can trace a single decision.

discovery.text: This is the 'black box' problem â€” the model works, but nobody knows exactly how.

twist.text: EU regulations now require explanations for automated decisions. Most AI can't comply.

climax.text: Explainable AI (XAI) is a growing field trying to open the black box without breaking it.

punchline.text: It works. We just can't tell you why.

quiz.question: What is the 'black box' problem in AI?
options: Models can't explain how they reach decisions
Training data is hidden from researchers
